Author: Cryptofist#7504
Content: Hi, Everyone â€“ Good Morning/Afternoon/Evening! Before I ask tons of questions,I should officially introduce myself. I'm Mike O, I've been helping Fishyguts on Pirate for the last few months. I saw the opportunity to work on Rogue yesterday morning, chatted with JL for a bit and will be working on some marketing endeavors. I'll be gathering info and getting together ideas for over the weekend, then rolling out what I can this upcoming week. This will include building a timeline going backward from a tournament event.  Any and all info, insight, and collaboration I can get is very much appreciated. I am excited to help showcase this tech and its value to the gaming and crypto communties!
